FOSUserBundle.group.show.name: Group name
FOSUserBundle.registration.check_email: An email has been sent to %email%. It contains an activation link you must click to activate your account.
FOSUserBundle.registration.confirmed: Congrats %username%, your account is now activated.
FOSUserBundle.registration.flash.user_created: The user has been created successfully.
FOSUserBundle.registration.email.subject: Welcome %username%!
FOSUserBundle.registration.email.message:
Hello %username%!

To finish activating your account - please visit %confirmationUrl%

This link can only be used once to validate your account.

Regards,
the Team.
FOSUserBundle.resetting.check_email:
An email has been sent. It contains a link you must click to reset your password.
Note: You can only request a new password once within %tokenLifetime% hours.

If you don't get an email check your spam folder or try again.
FOSUserBundle.resetting.flash.success: The password has been reset successfully.
FOSUserBundle.resetting.email.subject: Reset Password
FOSUserBundle.resetting.email.message:
Hello %username%!

To reset your password - please visit %confirmationUrl%

Regards,
the Team.
